com.shopify.buy.utils

Class AndroidPayHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.shopify.buy.utils.AndroidPayHelper

  • public final class AndroidPayHelper
extends Object
    Contains utility functions to help with Android Pay

    • Nested Class Summary

      static interface  AndroidPayHelper.AndroidPayReadyCallback
      Interface for receiving results from androidPayIsAvailable(Context, GoogleApiClient, AndroidPayReadyCallback)

    • Method Detail

      • createWalletCart

        public static com.google.android.gms.wallet.Cart createWalletCart(Cart shopifyCart,
                                                                  Shop shop)
        Creates a Wallet Cart from a Shopify Cart for use in Wallet Requests.
        Parameters:
        shopifyCart - The Cart to convert, not Null.
        shop - The Shop, not null.
        Returns:
        A Cart

      • createWalletCart

        public static com.google.android.gms.wallet.Cart createWalletCart(Checkout checkout)
        Creates a Cart from a Checkout for use in Wallet Requests. This is the preferred way to create a Wallet for use in FullWalletRequest
        Parameters:
        checkout - The Checkout to convert, not null.
        Returns:
        A Cart

      • createShopifyAddress

        public static Address createShopifyAddress(com.google.android.gms.identity.intents.model.UserAddress walletUserAddress)
        Creates a Shopify Address from a Wallet Address
        Parameters:
        walletUserAddress - UserAddress to convert, not null
        Returns:
        Address

      • createMaskedWalletRequest

        public static com.google.android.gms.wallet.MaskedWalletRequest createMaskedWalletRequest(String merchantName,
                                                                                          Checkout checkout,
                                                                                          String publicKey,
                                                                                          boolean phoneNumberRequired)
        Creates a Masked Wallet Request from a Shopify Checkout
        Parameters:
        merchantName - The merchant name to show on the Android Pay dialogs, not null or empty
        checkout - The Checkout to use, not null.
        publicKey - The Public Key to use, not empty.
        phoneNumberRequired - If true, the phone number will be required as part of the Shipping Address in Android Pay
        Returns:
        A MaskedWalletRequest

      • createFullWalletRequest

        public static com.google.android.gms.wallet.FullWalletRequest createFullWalletRequest(Checkout checkout,
                                                                                      com.google.android.gms.wallet.MaskedWallet maskedWallet)
        Creates a Full Wallet Request from a Shopify Checkout
        Parameters:
        checkout - The Checkout to use, not null.
        maskedWallet - A MaskedWallet returned from a previous MaskedWalletRequest sent to Android Pay
        Returns:
        A FullWalletRequest for use in retrieving a FullWallet

      • isCheckoutUpdateRequired

        public static boolean isCheckoutUpdateRequired(Checkout checkout,
                                               com.google.android.gms.wallet.MaskedWallet maskedWallet)
        Checks if new MaskedWallet response requires specified checkout to be updated or not. If any of the address attributes (City, Country Code, Province Code, ZIP code) or email have changed for specified checkout it requires to be updated.
        Parameters:
        checkout - the Checkout to be verified
        maskedWallet - the MaskedWallet to check with
        Returns:
        true if checkout should be updated, false otherwise

      • androidPayIsAvailable

        public static void androidPayIsAvailable(Context context,
                                         com.google.android.gms.common.api.GoogleApiClient apiClient,
                                         AndroidPayHelper.AndroidPayReadyCallback delegate)
        Checks to see if Android Pay is available on device. It will check that: 1) Play Services are available using hasGooglePlayServices(Context) 2) The Android Pay application is installed on device, and user has setup a valid card for In App Purchase using isReadyToPay(GoogleApiClient, AndroidPayReadyCallback)
        Parameters:
        context - The context to use.
        apiClient - The GoogleApiClient, not null
        delegate - The AndroidPayHelper.AndroidPayReadyCallback delegate for receiving the result

      • hasGooglePlayServices

        public static boolean hasGooglePlayServices(Context context)
        Checks to see if Play Services are available on device
        Parameters:
        context - The context to use.
        Returns:
        true if Play Services are available

      • isReadyToPay

        public static void isReadyToPay(com.google.android.gms.common.api.GoogleApiClient apiClient,
                                AndroidPayHelper.AndroidPayReadyCallback delegate)
        Checks to see if the Android Pay App is installed on device and has a valid card for In App Purchase using Payments.isReadyToPay(GoogleApiClient)
        Parameters:
        apiClient - The GoogleApiClient, not null
        delegate - The AndroidPayHelper.AndroidPayReadyCallback delegate for receiving the result

      • getAndroidPaymentToken

        public static PaymentToken getAndroidPaymentToken(com.google.android.gms.wallet.FullWallet fullWallet,
                                                  String androidPayPublicKey)
